dialogueTree.title: Drainage Pipe: "Behind the pipe -- the maintenance..."
dialogueTree.text: Behind the pipe -- the maintenance door, rusted shut and half-sunken in sand.

links.title: You: "What's in there?"
links.text: What's in there?

links.title: Drainage Pipe: "An ordinary drainage pipe. Darkness..."
links.text: An ordinary drainage pipe. Darkness.

links.title: You: "Okay. What *else*?"
links.text: Okay. What *else*?

links.title: Drainage Pipe: "As your eyes adjust, you see some t..."
links.text: As your eyes adjust, you see some trash -- crumpled up newspapers, cigarette butts. Someone has half-heartedly spray-painted 'SKULLS' on the right side.

links.title: You: "And?"
links.text: And?

links.title: Drainage Pipe: "And? And nothing. Broken glass from..."
links.text: And? And nothing. Broken glass from bottles thrown against the walls of the pipe. A syringe...

links.title: Perception (Smell): "A very, very faint smell of stale l..."
links.text: A very, very faint smell of stale liquor still lingers -- or is it just your imagination?

links.title: You: ""This looks like a great place to s..."
links.text: "This looks like a great place to stash narcotics. I want to make sure there's nothing hidden in there that children might pick up."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see. Another stop on your crusad..."
links.text: "I see. Another stop on your crusade against narcomania. I *was* hoping we were in pursuit of a murder suspect..."

links.title: You: "Could I get into the Feld building..."
links.text: Could I get into the Feld building through this pipe?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Given that this isn't a martial ar..."
links.text: "Given that this isn't a martial arts thriller," a grin flickers across his face, "it's highly unlikely -- and not without risk to our health either."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""However, the pipe suggests there m..."
links.text: "However, the pipe suggests there may be an entrance to the basement around..." The lieutenant pushes aside the reeds and looks around.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He means: the pipe must be coming f..."
links.text: He means: the pipe must be coming from *somewhere* in the building.

links.title: Logic: "Oh, duh, why didn't you think of th..."
links.text: Oh, duh, why didn't you think of that?

links.title: Suggestion: "The lieutenant's face lights up. He..."
links.text: The lieutenant's face lights up. He doesn't usually notice these little things.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...and it's right here! A maintena..."
links.text: "...and it's right here! A maintenance door." He points to a rusted metal double door to the right of the pipe, obscured by the reeds.

links.title: Interfacing: "It's jammed shut. The subtle approa..."
links.text: It's jammed shut. The subtle approach isn't going to work on this one.

links.title: Endurance: "Oh yeah... *big boy time*. This nee..."
links.text: Oh yeah... *big boy time*. This needs you to put your BACK into it.

links.title: You: "Try to pull the door apart."
links.text: Try to pull the door apart.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "The metal doors are heavy, and very..."
links.text: The metal doors are heavy, and very awkward to open on your own, but you just manage to slide them open wide enough for you to slide yourself between them...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good work." The lieutenant nods to..."
links.text: "Good work." The lieutenant nods toward the impenetrable darkness inside. "Shall we?"

links.title: You: "[Go in.]"
links.text: [Go in.]

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It looks too exhausting to even try..."
links.text: It looks too exhausting to even try. You'd only bloody your fingers on the rust.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You and the lieutenant lean all you..."
links.text: You and the lieutenant lean all your weight into pushing the doors apart, but you're not quite synchronized in your efforts. They slam shut again before you can enter.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant leans back against t..."
links.text: The lieutenant leans back against the door, panting. "Let's take a breather and try this again later? It's... very tough."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You can't seem to pry the doors apa..."
links.text: You can't seem to pry the doors apart for long enough to slip through. A second pair of hands would be really useful here.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Inland Empire: "This isn't gonna work without the l..."
links.text: This isn't gonna work without the lieutenant here. What if you *do* find a way in and it's a *trap*? Kitsuragi needs to be here, covering you.

dialogueTree.title: Drainage Pipe: "An old pipe peeks out from beneath..."
dialogueTree.text: An old pipe peeks out from beneath the rotting boards of the boardwalk. Could this be an alternative path into the Feld building?

links.title: Visual Calculus: "A building like this must have mult..."
links.text: A building like this must have multiple doors serving various functions. Perhaps a basement access?

links.title: You: "Come closer and look in."
links.text: Come closer and look in.

links.title: Drainage Pipe: "Your eyes slowly begin to adjust to..."
links.text: Your eyes slowly begin to adjust to the darkness inside the drainage pipe.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks over your shou..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks over your shoulder.

links.title: Inland Empire: "This isn't gonna work without the l..."
links.text: This isn't gonna work without the lieutenant here. What if you *do* find a way in and it's a *trap*? Kitsuragi needs to be here, covering you.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
